title.nl: STAP 1: Smart Client Intake (2 Min = Perfect Match)

nl.text:
WAAROM dit werkt: AI needs slechts 6 key data points voor 89% accurate matches.

The Magic Questions (ask in this order):

  1. Budget Range: 'Wat is je maximale budget?' (determines 67% of matches)
  2. Location Preferences: 'Welke wijken?' (eliminates 80% of irrelevant properties)
  3. Property Type: 'House, apartment, of both?' (final category filter)
  4. Must-Have Features: 'Garden, parking, sea view?' (quality matches)
  5. Deal-Breakers: 'Ground floor no-go?' (prevents waste)
  6. Timeline: 'When do you want to move?' (prioritization)

PRO TIP: Tesoro's AI learns from each interaction. After 10 clients, accuracy jumps to 94%!

COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGE: While others spend 30 minutes 'understanding needs', you have results in 2 minutes.
